pages.text: Saint Bernards were originally bred to guard and protect hospice patients, though this soon led them to becoming well-known rescue dogs in the mountains.$(br2)Standing at over a block tall, these large dogs come in five different coats.
These dogs are found in mountainous regions, and are more common in colder mountains. They can also rarely be found among ice spikes.

Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Salmon Treat.
